name: Bubble Corp.
description:
This is a small development for a game jam, the game is a small scuba diver who goes to different underwater places to pop all the bubbles to stop the world form flooding!

Controls are default:

Shift: Sprint

Left control: Crouch

Movement: WASD

Mouse Movement: Camera angle

Jump: Space Bar

Hold Mouse Right Click: Aim at target

Click Mouse Left Click: Shoot 

Assets Used:

DreamScape: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/dreamscape-nature-meadows

Cartoon Water Shader: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/cartoon-water-shader

Basic Directions: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/basic-8-directional-movem...
